snippet: The Devils have won three of four games since a four-game losing streak, as Ilya Kovalchuk scored for the second straight game.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat New York Islanders, 5-1; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils have won three of four games since a four-game losing streak, as Ilya Kovalchuk scored for the second straight game.

headline.seo: Devils’ Kovalchuk Scores Hat Trick in Rout of Islanders
headline.main: Devils and Kovalchuk Show Signs of Surging
headline.print_headline: Devils and Kovalchuk Show Signs of Surging
